summary: This is a criminal history record response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an FBI request for additional sentencing information from Florida. It contains Florida-only criminal history information for an unidentified subject, listing multiple Florida law enforcement and court agencies involved in the case.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency providing the criminal history record response to the FBI request.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
Margate Police Department; 5790 Margate Boulevard Margate, FL 33063
Palm Beach County Clerk of Court
Palm Beach County State Attorney's Office; 401 N. Dixie Hwy West Palm Beach, FL 33401
Riviera Beach Police Department; 600 West Blue Heron Boulevard Riviera Beach, FL 33404
keyFacts: The document is a criminal history record response from New York State DCJS to an FBI request for additional sentencing information from Florida.
The record contains Florida-only information for an unidentified subject, indicating the case involves Florida jurisdictions.
Multiple Florida agencies are listed including Margate Police Department, Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, and Riviera Beach Police Department.
The document was generated on October 6, 2021 in response to a delayed FBI request.
The record is described as a 'multi-source offender record' suggesting information was compiled from multiple Florida agencies.
